The Road Ahead for GrainPy

GrainPy
  • »
  • <no title>
  • View page source

GrainPy is a Python package for compiling, analyzing, visualizing, and interpreting grain size distribution data. The idea for GrainPy started with an abundance of grain size distribution data that wasnâ€™t being fully utilized. Initially, GrainPy was developed to quickly compile analyses of multiple samples, analyze results with geologic statistics and figures, and produce publication-quality grain size distribution plots. GrainPy will continue to add functionality, develop new methodologies of grain size distribution analysis and interpretation, and provide a user-friendly experience for sediment analyses.
